markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> varies;     **Effect** You create a vision of a token you could have crafted or make a short performance to inspire an ally within 60 feet. This otherwise works as the [_uplifting overture_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1779) cantrip.
